title: Drawing, "Beach with boats and people", 1881–82
medium: Charcoal, white crayon on cream wove paper
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of two men in oilskins in foreground; beach with boats drawn up on it, and groups of peope in middleground; and on the water in the distance are two sailboats.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Beach with boats and people", 1881–82.
1881–82. Charcoal, white crayon on cream wove paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-23.
